summary.span: 所有简单类型和复杂类型的基类。

span.span: The base class for all simple types and complex types.

remarks.format: ## Examples 有关使用此类的示例，请参阅类和 类。See the class and the class for an example using this class.

summary.span: 获取编译后对象类型或内置 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 数据类型、simpleType 元素或 complexType 元素。

span.span: Gets the post-compilation object type or the built-in XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) data type, simpleType element, or complexType element.

summary.span: 这是一个后架构编译信息集属性。

span.span: This is a post-schema-compilation infoset property.

value.span: 内置 XSD 数据类型、simpleType 元素或 complexType 元素。

span.span: The built-in XSD data type, simpleType element, or complexType element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ComplexType 派生自基值指定的类型。The complexType is derived from the type specified by the base value. 基值必须是 QName。The base value must be a QName. > [!IMPORTANT] > 属性已过时，并且已被 属性替换。The property is obsolete and has been replaced by the property.

summary.span: 获取此架构类型的基类型的编译后值。

span.span: Gets the post-compilation value for the base type of this schema type.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示此架构类型的基类型。

span.span: An object representing the base type of this schema type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性始终具有值，因为所有架构类型都有一个基类型。The property always has a value, because all schema types have a base type. 此值在架构编译时进行设置，使其成为后架构编译信息集的一部分。This value is set upon schema compilation, making it a part of the post-schema-compilation infoset.

summary.span: 获取有关此元素如何从其基类型派生的编译后信息。

span.span: Gets the post-compilation information on how this element was derived from its base type.
One of the valid values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了此属性可以包含的值。The following table shows the values that this property can contain. | 值 value|说明Description| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------| ||未指定任何派生方法。No derivation method specified.| ||通过替换派生。Derived by Substitution.| ||通过扩展派生。Derived by Extension.| ||由限制派生。Derived by Restriction.| ||派生者列表。Derived by List.| ||由 Union 派生。Derived by Union.|

summary.span: 获取或设置指示是否允许进一步派生的类型派生的最终特性。

span.span: Gets or sets the final attribute of the type derivation that indicates if further derivations are allowed.
One of the valid values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表显示了此属性可为简单类型包含的值。The following table shows the values that this property can contain for simple type. | 值 value|说明Description| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------| ||重写架构 `blockDefault` 设置，允许通过限制、扩展或替换进行派生。Overrides the schema `blockDefault` setting allowing any derivations by restriction, extension, or substitution to take place.| ||未指定任何派生方法。No derivation method is specified. 这是默认设置。This is the default. 派生规则取自 schema blockDefault 设置。Derivation rules are taken from the schema blockDefault setting.| ||不能替换为通过替换派生的类型。Cannot be replaced by a type derived by Substitution.| ||不能替换为通过扩展派生的类型。Cannot be replaced by a type derived by Extension.| ||不能由限制派生的类型替换。Cannot be replaced by a type derived by Restriction.| ||`#all`.`#all`. 不能由任何派生方法派生的类型替换。Cannot be replaced by a type derived by any derivation method.| 下表显示了此属性可为复杂类型包含的值。The following table shows the values that this property can contain for complex type. | 值 value|说明Description| |----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-----------------| ||重写架构 `blockDefault` 设置，允许通过限制、扩展或替换进行派生。Overrides the schema `blockDefault` setting allowing any derivations by restriction, extension, or substitution to take place.| ||未指定任何派生方法。No derivation method is specified. 这是默认设置。This is the default. 派生规则取自架构 `blockDefault` 设置。Derivation rules are taken from the schema `blockDefault` setting.| ||不能替换为通过替换派生的类型。Cannot be replaced by a type derived by Substitution.| ||不能替换为通过扩展派生的类型。Cannot be replaced by a type derived by Extension.| ||不能由限制派生的类型替换。Cannot be replaced by a type derived by Restriction.| ||`#all`.`#all`. 不能由任何派生方法派生的类型替换。Cannot be replaced by a type derived by any derivation method.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值指示在通过限制扩展类型时，如何限制类型。This value indicates how the type is restricted when the type is extended through restriction. 如果类型标记为，则 `final` 不能扩展此类型。If the type is marked as `final`, this type cannot be extended.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能直接序列化内置类型。You cannot directly serialize the built-in type. 如果需要对类型进行序列化，请创建一个派生自内置类型并序列化简单类型的新简单类型。If you need to serialize the type, create a new simple type which derives from the built-in type and serialize the simple type. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建类型并将其添加到架构。The following example shows how to create the type and add it to the schema. [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlschematype/cs/xmlschematype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/xmlschematype/vb/getbuiltinsimpletype.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置类型的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the type.
The name of the type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 名称必须是 (NCName) 的非冒号名称，如万维网联合会 (W3C) XML 命名空间规范中所定义。The name must be an no-colon name (NCName) as defined in the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) XML Namespaces specification. 如果指定此名称，则该名称在所有和元素中必须是唯一的 `simpleType` `complexType` 。If specified, the name must be unique among all `simpleType` and `complexType` elements.
